Author: GitHub
Description:
We asked the question: what does repository automation look like in the era of AI coding agents, and how can this be made safe and secure with sufficient guardrails? Introducing GitHub Agentic Workflows: automated intent-driven repository workflows that run in GitHub Actions. We’re bringing modern coding agents into the heart of repository automation, that can be powered by multiple coding agents, including GitHub Copilot, Claude by Anthropic, and OpenAI Codex.

Start using today: https://github.blog/ai-and-ml/automate-repository-tasks-with-github-agentic-workflows/?utm\_source=brand-youtube-vid-description-blog-agentic-workflows-tech-preview&utm\_medium=social&utm\_campaign=agentic-workflows-tech-preview-feb-2026
